home.headline: Data Scientist focused on MLOps, industrial ML, and production delivery.
about: I am a Data Scientist with a strong MLOps and cloud foundation, focused on building production-ready machine learning systems rather than standalone models.

My work spans the full ML lifecycle: data ingestion, feature engineering, model development, deployment, monitoring, and iteration. I recently led the development of an industrial predictive-maintenance system, combining interpretable ML models with a real-time monitoring dashboard to support operational decision-making in manufacturing environments.

I am particularly interested in the reliability and scalability of ML systems. My recent training and hands-on work emphasize Docker, Kubernetes, Linux, GitHub Actions, Terraform (Infrastructure as Code), and AWS, enabling reproducible pipelines, automated deployments, and maintainable cloud infrastructure.

With a background that bridges mechanical engineering and data science, I bring a systems-level mindset to ML problems—grounding models in physical intuition, operational constraints, and real-world impact. I aim to build ML products that are not only accurate, but deployable, observable, and trusted by end users.

resumes.title: Data Science Resume
bullets: Highlights ML project outcomes (predictive maintenance, segmentation, forecasting).
Emphasizes modeling + evaluation and practical delivery.

resumes.title: MLOps / Cloud Resume
bullets: Operational focus: Docker, Kubernetes, Linux, GitHub Actions, Terraform.
Positions projects as production-grade systems (deployment, monitoring, reproducibility).

resumes.title: Mechanical Engineering Resume
bullets: Mechanical design + manufacturing experience with full-cycle engineering.
Strong foundation bridging physical systems with data/automation.

work.title: Data Scientist / ML Engineer
work.subtitle: Predictive maintenance + monitoring dashboard for industrial equipment.
highlights: Developed an equipment health monitoring pipeline and trained models (Ridge, Random Forest, LSTM) balancing accuracy and interpretability.
Built an interactive Dash dashboard for real-time health scoring, trends, and maintenance alerts.
Strengthened reproducibility and operational readiness (structured workflows, environment management, deployment-minded design).

work.title: AWS Cloud Engineer / Cloud Architect
work.subtitle: Automation and standardization for AWS infrastructure operations.
highlights: Delivered a standardized EC2 'golden image' with essential tooling, improving server deployment efficiency by ~80%.
Automated monthly AWS usage dashboards to increase visibility and support decision-making.

work.title: Data Scientist Research Assistant
work.subtitle: Computer vision for remote sensing (ice concentration and classification).
highlights: Applied U-Net to satellite imagery to predict ice concentration and classify land/ice/water.
Achieved strong validation performance (low loss/MSE and high classification accuracy).

projects.title: Machine Health Prediction & Monitoring Dashboard
projects.tagline: Predictive maintenance system for industrial equipment using interpretable ML.
bullets: Developed an end-to-end predictive maintenance system using real-world industrial sensor data.
Built and evaluated multiple machine learning models (Ridge, Random Forest, LSTM), balancing accuracy with interpretability for operational use.
Performed feature engineering and time-series modeling to forecast equipment health and potential failures.
Designed and implemented an interactive Dash dashboard to visualize real-time health scores, historical trends, and maintenance alerts.
Structured the system with deployment-readiness, reproducibility, and monitoring in mind.

projects.title: AI Wall Painting Robot – Wall Segmentation
projects.tagline: Deep learning-based wall surface segmentation for robotic painting automation.
bullets: Implemented a Pyramid Scene Parsing Network (PSPNet) for industrial wall segmentation.
Designed an encoder–decoder architecture with a PPM-based decoder for pixel-wise classification.
Evaluated multiple training strategies including transfer learning and end-to-end training.
Achieved 92.13% accuracy and 72.58% IoU, enabling reliable automated wall-surface detection.
Preprocessed data by flattening irregular wall segments, resizing images, and applying data augmentation.

projects.title: UWAFT Controls – Autonomous Vehicle Control System
projects.tagline: Control algorithms and sensor fusion for an autonomous vehicle simulation.
bullets: Designed and implemented vehicle control algorithms from scratch in Python and MATLAB.
Derived kinematic and dynamic models to support motion planning and control.
Designed and tuned control parameters for stability and responsiveness.
Implemented an Extended Kalman Filter (EKF) for multi-sensor fusion to improve state estimation accuracy.

projects.title: Robotic Manipulator & Pick-and-Place System
projects.tagline: Control, mechanical design, and hardware-in-the-loop validation of a robotic arm.
bullets: Designed and implemented a control system for a robotic arm and pick-and-place manipulator.
Addressed nonlinearities and coupling effects through controller design and trajectory optimization.
Developed manual and automated control modes for efficient and repeatable motion.
Designed and fabricated GD&T-compliant mechanical components and integrated sensors and actuators via Arduino.
Performed system identification, parameter tuning, hardware-in-the-loop testing, and root cause analysis.

projects.title: Time Series Forecasting for TSLA Stock Prices
projects.tagline: Deep learning-based financial time series forecasting using attention models.
bullets: Implemented a Temporal Fusion Transformer to model and forecast Tesla (TSLA) stock prices.
Performed hyperparameter tuning across input window size, attention dropout, and learning rate schedules.
Evaluated model performance using MSE, RMSE, R², and explained variance.
Demonstrated applied use of sequence models on real-world financial data.

projects.title: ML Guard (In Progress)
projects.tagline: Lightweight MLOps monitoring and cloud cost guard for small ML teams.
bullets: Designing a minimal MLOps service to monitor model health, data drift, inference latency, and cloud costs.
Focused on production signals such as feature statistics, prediction distributions, and operational alerts.
Integrating AWS Cost Explorer to attribute cloud spend at the model or service level.
Built with a deliberate MVP scope to avoid over-engineering while preserving production realism.

projects.title: JobAI – AI Job Application Assistant (In Progress)
projects.tagline: Backend-first AI system for resume parsing and automated job application workflows.
bullets: Developing a FastAPI-based backend for structured resume and profile parsing.
Designing APIs to support automated job application workflows and downstream integrations.
Emphasizing clean interfaces, extensibility, and production-ready architecture.
Positioned for future features such as credit systems, automation pipelines, and scalable deployment.

projects.title: Machine Learning & Software Foundations
projects.tagline: Broad ML, deep learning, and software engineering experience across languages.
bullets: Hands-on experience with CNNs, RNNs, sequence models, regularization, hyperparameter tuning, and reinforcement learning.
Implemented systems for object detection, face verification, art style transfer, sentiment analysis, machine translation, and voice detection.
Developed a robotic system capable of recognizing and cleaning goose feces using computer vision.
Strong foundation in data structures and algorithms implemented in Python, MATLAB, C++, and C.
